response.raw:
Here is the memo with the requested information:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
MEMO: Project Status Update

Project Plans:
- Implement new warehouse management system (WMS) to optimize inventory tracking and order fulfillment
- Establish regional distribution hubs to reduce shipping times and costs
- Negotiate volume discounts with key suppliers and freight carriers

Progress to Date:  
- WMS vendor selected; system configuration underway and on schedule
- 2 of 4 planned regional DCs now operational; site selection for remaining 2 in progress
- Supply chain optimization has reduced COGS by 7% YTD

Results Achieved:
- Inventory accuracy improved from 92% to 98.6% since WMS go-live
- Average order processing time reduced by 28% 
- On-time, in-full delivery rate to customers up 6 percentage points
- Transportation spend down 11% from prior year
</OUTPUT_TEXT>

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
MEMO: Project Status Update

Project Plans:
- Implement new warehouse management system (WMS) to optimize inventory tracking and order fulfillment
- Establish regional distribution hubs to reduce shipping times and costs
- Negotiate volume discounts with key suppliers and freight carriers

Progress to Date:  
- WMS vendor selected; system configuration underway and on schedule
- 2 of 4 planned regional DCs now operational; site selection for remaining 2 in progress
- Supply chain optimization has reduced COGS by 7% YTD

Results Achieved:

- Average order processing time reduced by 28% 
- On-time, in-full delivery rate to customers up 6 percentage points
